A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie is outdone only by The Phantom Menace in its blemish on an otherwise amazing franchise. The self-parody of Star Wars with uncharacteristic lame\, cheesy joking throughout will induce many eye rolls. And\, it takes all the promises from the wonderful The Force Awakens and throws them out the window as meaninglessness. Add in several unnecessary scenes and characters\, and you have a recipe for most die-hard fans to leave feeling betrayed.
